channel.title: APIOps with Kong Konnect and Insomnia :: My New Hugo Site
channel.description: Introduction Insomnia Learning Objectives In this workshop, you will: Get an architectural overview of Kong Konnect platform. Set up Konnect runtime on Amazon Elastic Kubernetes Service (EKS). Learn what are services, routes and plugin. Deploy a sample microservice and access the application using the defined route. Use the platform to address the following API Gateway use cases Proxy caching Authentication and Authorization Response Transformer Request Callout Rate limiting And the following AI Gateway use cases
